final_implementation_statement: Issue #83 (Build MCP security gateway) has been successfully implemented with all acceptance criteria exceeded. The enterprise-grade security gateway provides zero-trust architecture, comprehensive threat protection, secure credential management, RBAC authorization, tamper-proof audit logging, and performance-optimized operations. The implementation is production-ready, fully tested, comprehensively documented, and successfully integrated with the RIF orchestrator ecosystem. Issue #84 and downstream security-dependent components are now unblocked for implementation.
